title: Godspell (1971 Off-Broadway Cast)
text:
Godspell (1971 Off-Broadway Cast) is the original cast recording of the <a href="Cherry%20Lane%20Theatre">Cherry Lane Theatre</a> production of "<a href="Godspell">Godspell</a>". It produced a radio hit in the summer of 1972 with "Day By Day" with Robin Lamont on the lead vocal. The image of the face on the album cover was designed by <a href="David%20Edward%20Byrd">David Byrd</a>.
Track listing.
Music and new lyrics by <a href="Stephen%20Schwartz%20%28composer%29">Stephen Schwartz</a> except as indicated.
